entry.title: Tuesday: A few showers or drizzle. High plus 3.

entry.title: Tuesday night: Chance of flurries. Low minus 6. POP 40%
entry.summary: Cloudy. 40 percent chance of flurries this evening. Wind northwest 30 km/h becoming light after midnight. Low minus 6. Wind chill near minus 11. Forecast issued 11:30 AM EST Tuesday 07 February 2023
